column2: Len : 1    RC-CBD OR HEMP - PAST YEAR USE
Len : 1    RC-CBD OR HEMP - PAST MONTH USE
Len : 1    RC-MARIJUANA VAPING - PAST YEAR USE
Len : 1    RC-MARIJUANA VAPING - PAST MONTH USE
OTE: Beginning in 2022, recoded variable MRJMONVAP2 replaces variable MRJMONVAP. The new version of the variable was created using
Len : 1    RC-MRJ VAPE, MRJ USE BUT NOT VAPE, OR NO MRJ USE - PAST MON
2 = Used mrj but did not vape mrj (MRJMON=1 and MJVAPMON=0) ............................
